  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.reef.runtime.common.driver.api.AbstractDriverRuntimeConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<Configuration>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalDriverRuntimeConfiguration
    Deprecated. 
    Runtimes are advised to create their own ConfigurationModules instead of subclassing this class.

public abstract class AbstractDriverRuntimeConfiguration
extends Object
implements Builder<Configuration>
